        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="62251" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="62251" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.10</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="958">958</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="174"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Météore</b> by <b>Louis Vuitton</b> is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Météore</b> was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Sicilian Orange and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Pepper, Tunisian Neroli, Indonesian Nutmeg and Guatemalan Cardamom; base note is Java vetiver oil. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html" de l'Homme Yves Saint Laurent" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Yves Saint Laurent</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">La Nuit de l'Homme</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes><span title="/perfume-finder/?p=62251" class="idLinkify"><span class="button small" style="color: white">Find more recommendations</span></span></div><div class="cell small-12" style="padding: 2px;"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x" id="newreview" style="margin-top:30px"><div class="rw-frame"><p class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->

align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2346005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2346005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2337232" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jlo8383"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2052614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jlo8383" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Angelique-Noire-1021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angélique Noire"title="Angélique Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2337232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2337232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052614">Jlo8383</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know this is marketed towards men but I just love the way it smells. It works well with my skin. I have a decant and I definitely love wearing it from time to time. I also have a decant to my person and he actually also loved it. So definitely can be interchangeable for men and women.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2337232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2337232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334084" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Cactus-Garden-53946.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53946.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cactus Garden"title="Cactus Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334084ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334084" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 21:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first review of a Louis Vuitton fragrance. I know I'm not starting with the most popular (I'll get to Imagination soon, promise.), but I've heard good things about Meteore as well. I remember trying it on a test strip at the LV Boutique and thinking it smelled quite nice, so I decided I'd pick up a sample and give it a go. Let's get into it;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
The opening is citrusy, fresh spicy, and aromatic. The primary notes I get are orange, bergamot, neroli, and pink pepper. The strongest of the notes are the orange and neroli. The orange notes, mandarin orange and sicilian orange, blend together to form a sweet but tart, juicy, and photo-realistic orange accord. The neroli also has citrus accords, but adds a noticeable green and aromatic nuance. This is followed by the bergamot and pink pepper. The bergamot adds even more citrus to the opening, but with a bit of fresh spiciness mixed in. Lastly, the pink pepper doubles down on the fresh spiciness to help round out all the citrus. My wife pointed out that the opening felt aquatic, and after her saying that I agree that it does have a bit of a watery, aquatic feel to it. The dry down is citrusy, woody, and fresh spicy. The primary notes I get are orange, bergamot, vetiver, and neroli. The strongest of the notes are still the orange and neroli. The orange notes are still juicy but more focused on tartness than sweetness. Likewise, the neroli is still citrusy but is focused more on the green nuances than the aromatics. This is followed by the vetiver and bergamot. The vetiver adds a subtle woodiness to the base while the bergamot keeps the same accord from the opening. In the dry down, I get a very distinct musky, "clean laundry" smell; and it gets stronger the more the fragrance dries down. But looking at the note breakdown, I can't determine where it's coming from. It seems I'm not the only one that gets this accord though.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is strong at around 4-6 feet. Sillage is moderate with a noticeable scent trail. After a few hours the projection and scent trail were unchanged. At about the 7-8 hour mark the projection was about arms length and the scent trail had faded a bit but was still noticeable. The fragrance became a skin scent shortly thereafter.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a spring/summer daytime fragrance through and through. That being said, it is very wearable. Meteore would work for pretty much any occasion; formal, casual, office, dates, it would be suitable for any.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like fresh, citrusy, and clean scents, or the idea of smelling like clean laundry appeals to you, this would be a safe blind buy.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
I went into my first LV fragrance with high hopes, and LV did not disappoint. It's obvious when smelling this fragrance that it's made to a high quality with premium ingredients. Nothing about it smells synthetic or cheap. The DNA of this fragrance is very enjoyable and something that everyone will think smells pleasant, and the performance is respectable for a DNA of this type. That being said, it's not a fragrance I can see myself spending the retail price of $330 on. But, if LV fragrances were available at discounters it would definitely be on my radar. I might have to find a good clone of this in the meantime.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2334084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2334084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shotsfired26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2240470"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2240470.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shotsfired26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2240470">Shotsfired26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This often gets compared to laundry sheets and that's a fair comparison, but Meteore is nowhere near as harsh or has an artificial scent. This is a fresh, spicy fragrance with BEAST performance at least for me. I get over 8 hours of longevity on this thing and a couple of sprays could choke out a small room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2329001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2329001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038395">fatiher123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>duş jeli + traş losyonu + biraz lv imagination karışımı. güzel keskin maskülen parfüm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714">JJ2137</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I acquired Nympheal (which is no more a captive molecule under patent protection) and upon first sniff I thought "thats Meteore". That sharp, soapy aquatic smell. Feels like this one material comprises most of the fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2327597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2327597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325691" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samurai23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samurai23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719">Samurai23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Météore is what happened when LV tried to create a fresh men's fragrance from scratch. It's a draft version, a baseline, a generic scent... That's ok but it's not a perfume you want unless you are a collector or an LV historian.<br />
Imagination, L'Immensite, Pacific Chill... That's where you should be looking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2325691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2325691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313768" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragboy1992"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1180884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1180884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragboy1992" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-Cologne-67039.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67039.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking Cologne"title="Viking Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1180884">Fragboy1992</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 18:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a 10 ml sample of this a couple years ago. I thought it smelled weird with very sharp citrus metallic smell. It almost gave me nausea. I wondered why LV would make a fragrance like this. I put my sample away and would try to give in another try from time to time but to no avail. I continued to use the sample and tried my best to ignore the sharp smell. I tried it again almost two years later and it grew on me a little bit. Then I found myself wanting to smell it again and again. I came to like the fact that it had a unique smell. If you can get past the sharp citrus smell, it's an amazing fragrance up their with Imagination. I actually just bought a 200ml bottle of it. It's very unique and it's definitely a grower fragrance. Some people will hate it but I think in the air it smells amazing. Try not to smell it too close. I highly recommend giving it a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2313768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2313768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frathead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1450052.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frathead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972791">alucas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>great. nearly emptied this and thought i’d give my two cents.. it’s the most beautiful, expensive shower gel ever.. long lasting.. rips through the heat. it’s a familiar smell and i think that’s why it’s not too popular. getting a refill 100%</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2276956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2276956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276654" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 03:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As the guy below me said, yes it smells like a wet wipe. But a good one<br />
<br />
Up close and on paper it doesn't smell that great, but it smells amazing in the air. <br />
Imo it falls short behind the other LV fresh fragrances. Imagination, Pacific Chill, L'immensite and Afternoon Swim are all better than this. But like them, i'd say it's safe to blind buy Meteore.<br />
<br />
This fragrance is fresh, citrusy, and slightly sweet. I do think this is a little more versatile than some of the other fragrances I mentioned, this could be a night fragrance too.<br />
<br />
This is obviously not worth the price. Just like every other LV fragrance. But if you like it and have the money, go ahead.<br />
<br />
Scent: 4/5<br />
Performance: 3/5<br />
Price: 1.5/5<br />
2.8/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2276654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2276654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247803" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Orbco97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Orbco97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247803ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247803" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); Love it. I find it unisex.  Deff reminds me of azzaro. <br />
<br />
If I passed by someone wearing this I would think they had just gotten out of a bubble bath.<br />
<br />
I collected perfumes for so long and never cared for LV perfumes… smelling at store doesn’t do their fragrances any justice, get samples to see what a difference it makes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2247803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2247803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247211" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kevinsl3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kevinsl3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713195">kevinsl3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening and mid is pretty much a niche Azzaro Chrome. The dry down however is different. Chrome remains basically the same as the opening and mid. Meteore turns into a strong burnt powdery/rubber smell. Kinda hard to describe. It stays on my skin for 6+ hours. Good longevity.  I have received compliments on it. So it must have a good scent trail. I use this for casual days, outdoors, and gym. 8/10 overall.<br />
<br />
 I own afternoon swim, pacific chill, imagination and meteore.   So far my ratings are:   <br />
1. Imagination <br />
2.Afternoon Swim.<br />
3. Pacific chill.<br />
4. Meteore.<br />
All great summer high heat fragrances<br />
I have City of Stars on the way 😁</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2247211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2247211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A woman stopped me and said wow you smell like a god. Shines in the high heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2237255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2237255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232177" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I generally like the pepper citrus combination. But it made me feel a synthetic bitterness. To test this, I sprayed a single spray on my arm. Its scent stayed on my arm for hours. Even though I washed it several times, I couldn't get rid of it. Maybe it just isn't right for me. But it reminds me of lozenges used for sore throat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2232177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2232177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230204" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230204" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C.Francisque27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="C.Francisque27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230204ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230204" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570494">C.Francisque27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled this at the LV store, and it smells almost identical to Green Pearl by Thameen. The only difference being the lack of a green apple note in Météore. I would say performance, projection, sillage, and overall scent is far superior in Green Pearl than it is here. Green Pearl is also less expensive, so if you're trying to save some money, go with GP instead of Météore.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2230204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2230204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts quite awhile compared to others in the same category. No complaints other than a very high price point.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2227862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2227862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217060" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hokeypokeyguy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hokeypokeyguy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-68074.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68074.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme"title="Scandal Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903875">hokeypokeyguy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 21:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is honestly a 10/10 fragrance. <br />
<br />
Yes, it's simple but I went to the Louis Vuitton store today and smelt nearly everything they had. Météore ended up being my favorite of all, with City of Stars in second place.<br />
<br />
It's a scent that's easy to like. It's fresh, it's citrusy, it's clean. On this batch I get 8+ hours of longevity with good projection.<br />
<br />
For most people, this fragrance would not have a wow factor. But for me, as soon as I spray this on my skin, I immediately start sniffing at it until I go noseblind. It's seriously addictive! <br />
<br />
Safe blind buy, and honestly to me every LV is a safe blind buy. Not a single perfume in that store did I dislike...if you're fine with the price of course.<br />
<br />
Talking price: 320$ USD. <br />
<br />
Just the price you would expect from LV. However, I believe it to be completely worth the price. Also, I wish people would stop bringing down certain fragrances for their price points rather than their smell. Seriously annoying...<br />
<br />
When I left the store, the workers had given me 3 samples: Météore, Imagination, and Afternoon Swim. <br />
<br />
Imagination didn't last long on me, but it smelt wonderful for the time it did. Afternoon Swim actually smelt even better than both of them, but only in the opening, and it didn't last too long either. <br />
<br />
Météore was the one that proved to be the best. (I can still get whiffs of it!)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2217060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2217060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212410" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pa Ah Ah N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pa Ah Ah N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329579">Pa Ah Ah N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 19:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is there any reformulation?<br />
<br />
One batch I got smell so smooth and amazing but dry down into a sour smell on my skin in 4 hours..<br />
<br />
On the new batch I got smell amazing too but too quickly turning into something too peppery and dry vetiver, like in 15 mins. Which is very disappointing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2212410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2212410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Clean, safe and mass appealing . Rate this one a 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2211519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2211519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207431" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hussrahal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hussrahal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487">hussrahal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very good, underrated. An excellent, excellent dupe is Alexandria's Le Meteore. Better performance, can't tell them apart in the air.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2207431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2207431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FloridaFrags33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2174980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FloridaFrags33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2174980">FloridaFrags33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is probably my favorite freshie ever!! It's so so soooo good as a simple fresh and clean scent. Performance on me is amazing for a freshie, 20 hours and still a fairly detectable skin scent. I really really like this juice! However, the price...... $320 for something like this is insane. I understand that Louis likes to keep that more exclusive vibe than somebody like Dior. Where Dior has their designer scents and then more expensive and exclusive "private" style line; Louis came straight out the gate with private line priced fragrances with just slightly, I mean 5-10% above designer scent profiles. Yes some of the Louis fragrances are their own thing and I get that. But $320 for a freshie smell that you could get out of something a 10th of the price just doesn't seem right. I don't know... I'm all about forking over money hand over fist for fragrances that I enjoy as this is my main hobby of many; but these fragrances for the most part do not reflect the price point or performance that you are getting from them. Ahh the lovely world of fragrance collecting. I almost kind of miss the "ignorance is bliss" stage of collecting when I didn't over analyze every fragrance I encountered. These are basically really well blended designer scents for niche or even above niche prices. Although, like I said before; this is my all time favorite freshie. The allure and performance that this fragrance creates from such a simple note breakdown is hard to fault... except for the price hehe. I love this hobby though and have met so many amazing people from it. At the end of the day it's all in good fun and enjoying this beautiful live we all live. Cheers to more amazing fragrances in the future!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2197328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2197328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196103" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts quite long but the sillage is mediocre but is like a bomb when you start to sweat. 5 sprays minimum!! also a comfortable smell so sometimes i wear this even though im just at home.<br />
Blind buy safe but still don't recommend blind buying a loui frag if  you don't want to regret.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2196103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2196103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981641">etonefragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@winnerman<br />
<br />
That’s probably the worst comparison of all time</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2152812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2152812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146779" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudemale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191172.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudemale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Météore"title="Météore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146779ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146779" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172">eaudemale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Forget when I said that this smells like Chrome, it doesn’t that much, maybe in the metallic style. This is a metallic dryer sheets/recently watched hands with expensive soap vibe but also smells like clean sheets (including the fabric). Ultra blended and clean, almost too linear. As it dries down it starts to smell like rubber. <br />
The only thing I can put in the same category but not too similar or clone is Montabaco Intensivo with that antiseptic airiness.<br />
<br />
Edit: it does remind me a lot of Montabaco Intensivo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2146779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2146779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146226" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceZoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1853562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceZoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-30567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wulóng Chá"title="Wulóng Chá"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853562">FragranceZoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 04:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such an outstanding fragrance and not because of how it smells, well yes but the way the perfumer constructed this is a work of art <br />
<br />
This is super super fresh spicy, a little sweet, aquatic and just a touch blue. It may sound like a “basic bro” scent but my god this is what a 300$ basic bro scent would smell like <br />
<br />
11/10 idc it’s absolutely amazing. I’ll say this is blind but safe 100% but only if this is your FIRST fragrance ever and you dad is bill gates 😂</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2146226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2146226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2136219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658356">CHESTDAYBABY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>sexy, simple, yet masterfully engaging.<br />
<br />
it is absolutely true that this smells linear and doesn’t live up to it’s price, I agree.<br />
<br />
not everything has to be overly complex, it doesn’t need to be anything at all actually.<br />
<br />
so long as you enjoy it and it makes you feel damn good, that’s a 10/10 in my books.<br />
<br />
wear imagination if you want compliments, wear l'immensité for compliments and a badass masculine vibe, and wear météore if you want other guys' girlfriends to compliment you (yes it happened lmao).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brendan87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brendan87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090916">Brendan87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts with brilliant and strong ocean-y smelling citrus.  Very long lasting even after 12 hours for me.  Bit strong for a summer day fragrance — I think it would be best at night.  It reminds me of walking on the beach or the boardwalk at night.  It’s a wonderful scent, but it dries down to a blue clean scent that smells like you washed your hair with your dad’s shower gel.  Or like a high school boy trying cologne for the first time.  It’s not a bad scent and it could be sexy on the right guy.  It’s just not my preference and extremely expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2133683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2133683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scotty123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scotty123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zaharoff/Signature-Pour-Homme-56744.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56744.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature Pour Homme"title="Signature Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204142">Scotty123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This clearly resembles Azzaro Chrome, but only in the slightest of ways. It opens with some clean fresh citruses and moves on to some spicy freshness this is where it differs from Chrome. Chrome continuously keeps that clean fresh metallic smell and that’s where people draw the comparison. I was guilty of this at first as well. However once you’ve experienced this scent a few times then you can clearly see the differences. Meteore is a similar scent but easily more superior in every way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2132959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2132959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fresh and long-lasting. Super versatile: smells great during the day and in the evening. Love having this in my collection. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2131766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2131766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1667389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667389">Sniffers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@Ksj,<br />
<br />
The only joke around here is your review. Funny how myself and so many others find imagination to be one of the greatest fresh male scents currently on the market. I think you stink of someone who wastes all their money putting stuff up your nose; that might explain your bitter appraisal of LV fragrances. <br />
<br />
As for Météore itself. I found this to lean too feminine for my taste the first few wears of my sample, but after spending some time with it; I am all in for a bottle. <br />
<br />
Extremely fresh smelling, that unmistakable LV dry down, brilliant staying power, and it provoked a few compliments. <br />
<br />
This will make an excellent spring/summer addition to my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2129904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2129904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126701" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="benkim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/351263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="benkim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Vibrato-75930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrato"title="Vibrato"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/351263">benkim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 14:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pink pepper, bitter vetiver, citrus. <br />
Because of vetiver, I feel that this slightly leans masculine. Vetiver starts with the citrus and stays with you. As citrus evaporates, you are left with pink pepper and strong vetiver. You could probably pull this off as a "professional" scent imo, but the price tag is not justified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2126701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2126701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122389" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-52.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);
