<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Side note:<br />
<br />
I just still can't believe what they're charging for these scents. <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
It's thievery...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2122389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2122389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121492" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="n&iacute;simaldar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1548982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="n&iacute;simaldar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Superman-20125.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20125.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Superman"title="Superman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); (I think the dryer sheet smell is the LV "clean" musks combined with neroli). Pleasant but not worth this price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2121492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2121492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samurai23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samurai23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719">Samurai23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Météore reminds me of Percival from PdM. Maybe it's a bit lighter and fresher. Don't like either of them. And yes, it's generic and underwhelming when you expect something more from this brand and especially Jacques Cavallier.<br />
I'm saying this while I think that Imagination is arguably the pinnacle of fresh men's fragrances.<br />
<br />
Scent: it smells<br />
Longevity: who cares<br />
Sillage: who cares<br />
Price: expensive<br />
Overall: no</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2119095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2119095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pegagsus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082733.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pegagsus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082733">Pegagsus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Météore by Louis Vuitton encapsulates a paradoxical fusion of ephemeral allure and enduring sophistication. This fragrance navigates an intricate olfactory labyrinth, weaving together nuanced layers of aromatic complexity. At its core lies a captivating interplay of woody accords and floral essences, enveloped in a subtle veil of spice and musk. The result is an enigmatic aroma that evolves with each application, revealing new facets of its intricate composition. While its opulent blend may not appeal to all sensibilities, Météore exudes an undeniable aura of refinement and mystery, making it a compelling choice for those who appreciate fragrances that defy convention.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2112750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2112750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arondaevu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1884634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arondaevu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884634">Arondaevu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lot of people are saying it’s pretty basic &amp; generic and I get that. But I think it does have place in your collection. It literally lasts all day and night, it performs very well in the hot summer. I wore it to a beach party in Miami and later that night people were still saying how good I smelled.  I think the dry down is very sexy and it gets a lot of compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2111252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2111252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jajohnso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.844126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jajohnso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Smoking-Hot-84413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smoking Hot"title="Smoking Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844126">jajohnso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 03:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like ANY other Wal-Mart freshie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2110472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2110472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108501" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jigginssean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1034490.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jigginssean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490">jigginssean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 00:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meteore is one I feel that you can wear in all seasons. It is very fresh &amp; clean but also works well in colder conditions to give a crisp aura. Perfect for wearing on a clear starry night! I get hints of fresh cucumber along with masculine citrus &amp; seems to be fairly powerful in terms of performance. Might not be the most interesting in terms of uniqueness but it's a mass appealing fresh &amp; versatile concoction.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2108501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2108501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106820" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salohcin2148"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salohcin2148" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Vibrato-75930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrato"title="Vibrato"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106820ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106820" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415">Salohcin2148</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After going through 2 LV decants of this I finally pulled the trigger on a 100ml at full price. It just works. Fragrances are subjective so not everyone is going to love this and I don't blame them. I can wear this year round in any situation and its lasts all day long and those type of fragrances are what I gravitate toward. This will never collect dust and will mostly likely get refilled a few times. If you're a collector with a sizable collection you would agree that you could probably count on one hand the scents that fit this bill. <br />
<br />
Don't let the reviews deter you, get a sample and WEAR this a FEW TIMES before you pass judgement. I absolutely didn't want to pay full price but at the end of the day every time I wore it I had a smile on my face so I decided to pick it up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2106820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2106820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DStace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684297"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684297.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DStace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/L-Immensite-49751.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49751.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Immensité "title="L’Immensité "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684297">DStace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really nice fragrance that most people would enjoy. It’s very ‘sporty’ and masculine. <br />
<br />
To me, this smells like a young man’s scent, someone in their 20’s. Kinda reminds me of PDM Percival, definitely in the same lane. <br />
<br />
Very expensive for the fragrance profile, you can get this scent a lot cheaper, but probably not at same level or quality. <br />
<br />
If you’re not worried about money and are looking for a winning active scent, then you can’t go wrong with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2101683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2101683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100461" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dior Sausage"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dior Sausage" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396756">Dior Sausage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 04:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells a lot like Narcisso Rodriguez Blue Noir Eau De Parfum to me, can't believe no one has mentioned it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2100461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2100461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrBolton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161847"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1161847.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrBolton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Villa-Neroli-74483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Villa Néroli"title="Villa Néroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161847">MrBolton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 22:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample from the LV boutique. I can't decide how I feel about this one. My wife doesn't like it much. She described it as smelling like the mens fragrance section of a department store--saying it's generic, very overpowering/strong, and cloying. She isn't as attuned to fragrances as us nerds, so I like her opinions; the most hyped fragrances on here she'll usually go "meh" about.<br />
Me on the other hand, I'm getting a ton of nostalgia off this one. It reminds me of when I would spray some generic freshies together mixing/matching all over in high school, except this smells like the best I ever would have mixed together. I think it does its thing in a very high quality way, as others have stated. It doesn't smell cheap at all, but neither does it smell unique.<br />
I had smelled this in Honolulu last Summer, and it brings me back to walking around Waikiki! This feels best in a casual situation, like that, but I guess it could be dressed up some... although I think it smells a little juvenile. Anyone 40+ I think this would just be totally out of place on. L'Immensite would fill that role better, although I don't think these are very similar. L'Immensite is the grown up version.<br />
Longevity and performance and great on my skin. No complaints about that. I don't think this one seems to evolve as much as some have claimed here, as I found it very linear across 8 hours of wear today.<br />
Definitely in the same family as Parfums de Marly Percival and Kilian Vodka on the Rocks. If you were keeping a smaller collection, having both would be fairly redundant. Seeing as Percival can be easily found in 125mL for close to half the price and smells a little less cloying/generic/youthful, I think Percival is the way to go.<br />
Afternoon Swim destroys this one in every respect, except performance. However, once Afternoon Swim has macerated for at least 6 months, it turns into a fresh beast! I'll take Afternoon Swim over Meteore in almost any head-to-head.<br />
I also like Meteore better than Imagination, which I think is overhyped and smells like a Glade bathroom freshener. L'Immensite I need to wear more, but think Meteore performs better and is more suited to Summer. Also think L'Immensite is better for my age (28).<br />
Price tag wise, I think there are others in the LV collection more deserving of the current $320 (Afternoon Swim especially), but I'm ultimately going to have a hard time not finding an excuse to buy this at some point, as I'm all about "memory lane." My bank account can rest easy for now.<br />
Blind buy safe? If you love fresh, youthful fragrances and like Mont Blanc Legend, Percival, Vodka on the Rocks, then I'd say you'd probably like this. Anyone who doesn't like those would surely not like this.<br />
7.5/10 overall for me, probably 2/10 for my wife.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2094963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2094963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2088781" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2088781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2088781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 02:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very pleasant, basic all-rounder. <br />
<br />
Does this smell like Azzaro Chrome? I have no idea, I've never smelt it. I think it's clear to be said with all LV fragrances though, is that they all smell of great quality and they're well put-together. <br />
<br />
It's a clean fresh citrus-woody fragrance that does have that shower gel vibe, but because it smells relatively high quality for me it sets itself apart from the other typical fragrances in the same ball-park. In terms of similarity, it's probably somewhere in-between l'imennsite and afternoon swim. But longevity and projection is better than afternoon swim. <br />
<br />
For me, it's a great fragrance, however I wouldn't pay full retail for this (I wouldn't for any LV fragrance). I got this for around £150 so for 100ml it's worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2088781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2088781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2088386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="khalilovmh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="khalilovmh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Grand-Soir-40816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grand Soir"title="Grand Soir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2088386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2088386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992867">khalilovmh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Clear Men" shampoo for 3 dollars</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2088386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2088386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JJ2137"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JJ2137" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714">JJ2137</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-08">03/08/24 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would give it "ok" rating if It cost 30$... Man, the first hit is generic men's shower gel and after 15 minutes what you get is sharp, suffocating, peppery, musky deodorant... for 300$? Give me a break</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2086143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2086143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084582" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Terp_sniffer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Terp_sniffer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047215">Terp_sniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 17:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally got my nose on Météore at a Louis Vuitton boutique the other day and I have to admit it came off rather juvenile at first.  Enough so that I discarded the scent card immediately rather than hold onto it with the others.  However after revisiting it a few times via a sample the salesperson left me with I finally realized why it came off as juvenile.  It smells nearly the same as I did when I was 12 wearing Boss in Motion.  Doesn’t have the green notes but it’s just as fresh (if not fresher) and still carries all the same nostalgic qualities I remember from my first ever cologne purchase as a teen.  In one week Météore went from a never will I ever to a scent I need to add to my collection</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2084582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2084582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arsenal Till I Die"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arsenal Till I Die" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507">Arsenal Till I Die</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a more powdery azzaro chrome.<br />
I actually prefer chrome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2078331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2078331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RyanDaRaider"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RyanDaRaider" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001241">RyanDaRaider</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My girl liked this more than myself, decent but Imagination is better. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2078328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2078328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075954" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="millerje86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="millerje86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877">millerje86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-27">02/27/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everything the people who have actually smelled this scent said is true. Yes it’s simple, yes it smells like a million other things you’ve smelled a million times. But it’s also easy to like, and performs well. This reminds me of what PDM does with their fresh scents - taking popular scent profiles and niche’ing them up a bit. <br />
<br />
On scent alone, I don’t think I could suggest anyone purchase this outright - definitely sample first. The reason I purchased this was more for the feeling of nostalgia it brought me. It gives me a calming feeling and takes me back towards my young teenage years - simpler times. I think anyone form the 90’s/early 2000’s would understand. Where it smells LIKE a lot of things, it’s lot identical to any. Pacific Chill shares in that regard, and may possibly be my next.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2075954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2075954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070709" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="discardedandroid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="discardedandroid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239217">discardedandroid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-22">02/22/24 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Massively overrated and overpriced, but still not a bad fragrance. It's like baby powder, but without the powder, and... without the baby? It's like a stone cold clean fragrance that's evocative of baby powder but isn't powdery. A little bit stone-y and space-y, if you can imagine that. Pleasant but doesn't justify its price. It's just okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2070709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2070709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dantek121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dantek121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375">dantek121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have had this fragrance for a good amount of time now and can say that the scent profile is more mass appealing than Imagination and L'Immensite. This stuff smells great on skin but phenomenal in the air. Also, I'm getting 10 hours easy of longevity which is more than I get from Imagination and significantly more than what I was getting from L'Immensite. I actually have never smelled Azzaro Chrome and don't remember what CK One smells like but this reminds me a bit of Silver Mountain Water with actual strength.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2064609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2064609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062358" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salohcin2148"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salohcin2148" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Vibrato-75930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrato"title="Vibrato"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415">Salohcin2148</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression is that this could be a love. I'll agree that initially it comes off basic but if you give it a proper wear you will realize there is a little magic added to this fragrance. I haven't smelled freshness captured like this before without coming off as cheap smelling. This is quality. The opening 30-45 minutes really plays into how others have called this mediocre and I would have agreed if I kept my experience to a test strip or a spray on the back of the hand. After the opening settles this transforms into something ozonic, fresh, aldehydic, cool and slightly metallic, light airy and ethereal, yet very present. The color of the juice portrays this well and the name Meteore is spot on. It's invigorating and uplifting. This can be a little overpowering so 2-3 sprays on skin is enough (maybe one on clothing for good measure). I'm surprised as I had really low expectations because of people bashing this one. I see a bottle in my future.<br />
<br />
Of note, I will say after spraying several LV fresh scents in store the TEST STRIPS do not do these fragrances justice. Although simple, the oils are quality and are meant to blend with your skin chemistry and only then will you get a sense of what is trying to be accomplished. Otherwise you get laundry detergent, dryer sheets, soap and air freshener as has been stated by so many reviews on the LV review pages.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2062358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2062358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Oudgasm-Cafe-Oud-19-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-85187.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85187.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 20:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It just reminds me of a Ckone variant and whilst I do find it pleasant and like it, it’s not worth £250 for 100ml. I can’t help but feel intellectually superior when someone tells me they have paid so much money for a fragrance. Louis Vuitton are having a laugh at our literal expense now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2052398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2052398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049485" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmallCookie4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmallCookie4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/LV-Lovers-93785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LV Lovers"title="LV Lovers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701635">SmallCookie4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 20:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample from LV, and it smells basic BUT very refined if that makes sense reminds me of something from 2010. The quality of the ingredients are phenomenal, my limmensite DID get stronger over time as well. I think its worth it for the LV tax</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2049485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2049485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314272">Eau de Maude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Boujie AF CK1</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046703" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brcamp13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="brcamp13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046703ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046703" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813662">brcamp13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells broadly like a masculine-leaning department store when you walk in, to my nose. It’s fairly generic and masculine, and at this price point I’d recommend getting a different LV fragrance (imagination, afternoon swim), since you can get generic male fragrances for much less.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2046703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2046703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038155" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jj000777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jj000777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612">jj000777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 01:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m so glad my bf and I smelled this without looking at notes or reviews. We love perfumes and I’f just gotten ~20 samples for him from split scent to begin exploring.<br />
<br />
This was our #1. (Top 4 below) this is such a crazy f*cking scent. We got literal meteor on him. Cold void of space and clean dry rock. Atmospheric, clean and just like someone else mentioned, a major grower. The fact that this is a citrus boggles my mind. It’s like alchemy. Super cool, bought it for him for vday. <br />
<br />
Top 4:<br />
<br />
1. Meteore<br />
2. Silver Mountain Water<br />
3. Bal D’Afrique<br />
4. Luna Rose Ocean</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2038155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2038155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029886" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Freshnclean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927839"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Freshnclean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927839">Freshnclean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-13">01/13/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As someone else said below, this is the kind of scent you sample and think is kind of meh, but then keep going back to and start to like more and more. It’s a serious grower. Sometimes it’s ok to not make a huge statement but instead be subtle and close to the skin. People may not pick up on it at first, but eventually they will subconsciously think of you whenever they catch a whiff of it - that’s the kind of scent this is. It’s a very calming, peaceful kind of fragrance. I get a touch of rose mixed in with the citrus, although it’s not listed as a note. <br />
<br />
Quietly great. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2029886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2029886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not at all worth the money. <br />
Scent: 7.5/10<br />
Value: 1.5/10<br />
Overall: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2025701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2025701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016720" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lazarus A"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lazarus A" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861170">Lazarus A</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Météore is a beautifully complex citrus fragrance, my perception is that the citrus notes are very nicely layered and don't just radiate the "Lemon" scent profile. It's a wonderful pick for anybody who is looking for a rich, refined and well thought out citrus fragrance with a light but noticeable fruity kick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2016720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2016720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012907" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentsunited"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1424193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1424193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentsunited" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1424193">scentsunited</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 04:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mix feeling on this one … at times it give off basic vibes then a next time smells very expensive its a bit weird. …sometimes you get silver mount water from creed mix with some florals it’s classy for sure but the price point is not worth it there’s other options out there!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330577">Mjchaelj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-28">10/28/23 19:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very clean fresh orange creamsicle. I recently went to the LV store with the intention of getting Ombré Nomade or Noveau Monde. I was looking for a dark fragrance. I took home Noveau Monde along with samples of other fragrances including Meteore and Imagination. The drydown of Noveau Monde grossed me out after a while. I couldn’t stop smelling the sample I got of Meteore so the next day I went to exchange it. It was just that good. Very simple easygoing scent but extremely sexy. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1963222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1963222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
