padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1957882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ckorp8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ckorp8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Laylati-55159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Laylati"title="Laylati"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1957882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1957882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605">ckorp8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-21">10/21/23 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stayed on my skin for only an hour and a half but on clothing for well over 24 hrs, with about 6 hrs projection. Opened with a nose slicing citrus then turned peppery and spicy which is more or less the essence of this juice. The dry down is the slightly sweet vetiver base which seemed to be present in many designer perfumes. Overall it’s likable but nothing unique and deserving for this price range.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1957882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1957882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954955" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CarlosLozano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187651"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1187651.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CarlosLozano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187651">CarlosLozano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 07:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just like Azzaro Chrome but with higher quality ingredients and better performance. The next step to get if you love the Chrome or CK One DNA. I’m personally neutral to that scent but it smells nice. I just couldn’t take of my head the fact that at least for me, it smelled like something you could buy for $20 at a rack store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1954955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1954955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954559" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dantek121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dantek121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580375">dantek121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 18:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Silver mountain water vibes all the way. They aren't the same but that was the first thing I thought when smelling the middle-drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1954559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1954559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538">Kyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 01:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first smell I liked it but afterwards it got me nauseated. <br />
<br />
My thoughts on this right now are just: Ew. I do have to say that this review will be completely biased because I will compare this to something else that I’ve smelled before and I don’t think everyone here will be able to relate to that or even pick up that smell, anyway.<br />
<br />
To me it smells like fresh citrusy baby products with a hint of egg, yes, baby products and egg. The very first time I smelled it I thought it was amazing, really fresh, green and overall pleasant, but not even a minute after I got hit with an unexplainable smell that I ended up recognizing as being EXTREMELY close to that of the baby lotions/shampoos of my country, and then to top things off, I got a nauseating dense feeling from it that reminded me of the smell of an egg; if you’re familiarized with D&amp;G Light Blue Eau Intense you probably know that in some people’s skin, an egg smell can be felt in the air, well, same thing happens with this (at least to me) and it completely ruins the fragrance, cause personally, I wouldn’t want to smell like the baby of a millionaire who was recently showered and just ate and egg.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1952191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1952191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947586" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dumbplings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dumbplings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281">Dumbplings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have never seen a less accurate "reminds me of" section...<br />
<br />
This definitely has a very dry bitter wood in here I thought it was oud at first but it's vetiver oil, super concentrated very dry and bitter. <br />
<br />
The fresh citrus smell in this fragrance smells really cheap, like petigrain. Really reminds me of Creed Silver Mountain Water or some other fragrance like that. Just that petigrain cheap citrus smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1947586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1947586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1936923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1936923" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AhmedElamy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532344.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AhmedElamy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1936923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1936923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); Both smell super elegant, however, the extreme soapy smell feels nauseating to me unless I go really light on the sprayer like 2 -3 sprays would be more than enough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1936923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1936923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918854" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JpallaresT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JpallaresT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918854ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918854" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534246">JpallaresT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot tell exactly why I love this thing so much, because it can be taken as a somewhat basic, simple, maybe even "generic" citrusy fresh fragrance. But it's that, with Louis Vuitton quality. A neroli base surrounded with spices and citruses on top, drying to a beautiful vetiver results in a smooth, versatile, safe, mass-appealing, while smelling delicious. I've got many compliments from women. Loving this LV in my collection along with Imagination. It's my choice of "blue" fragrance at the moment. Awesome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1918854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1918854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913711" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mushk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mushk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Vibrant-Leather-Oud-53691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrant Leather Oud"title="Vibrant Leather Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913711ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913711" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232112">Mushk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-28">08/28/23 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts citrusy and very soon pepper comes through with a grassy backdrop.<br />
Neroli is also there in the background but comes forward after a few mins and stays there for most of the mid - thats when it leans a lil feminine but really posh - like a vanity box (surprisingly) - and then drydown sometimes appears soapy to me and other times grassy vetiver-y. <br />
<br />
After a few wears I have come to deduce that what I thought smelled like a vanity box is actually the smell of an Aircraft's Lavatory. <br />
<br />
Idk whether all lavatory smell the same but this certainly reminds me of it now and that's all I smell now. Genius right? Someone else likened it to a Public Shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1913711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1913711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912231" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moein_Ashraf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262530.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moein_Ashraf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Coeur-Battant-57129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cœur Battant"title="Cœur Battant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262530">Moein_Ashraf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 15:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a pleasant fragrance with a familiar scent . Opening is hot and spicy . Then it becomes sweet and cool .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1912231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1912231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1909884" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Papi_Nutella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Papi_Nutella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1909884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1909884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565846">Papi_Nutella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-23">08/23/23 18:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get  Azzaro Chrome + Creeds SMW! Great for the summer!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1909884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1909884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's got this cloudy, ozonic and slightly metallic orange profile to it, really bright scent. Performance and sillage are good on this one too (got around 7/8hrs with it). I'd give it a solid 7.4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1906784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1906784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1904339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1904339" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jqwalls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1778223.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jqwalls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-One/Office-For-Men-55166.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55166.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Office For Men"title="Office For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1904339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1904339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778223">Jqwalls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-17">08/17/23 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a must for anyone who loves bright, spring and summery fragrances. Instantly likable by everyone who has ever smelled it on me. Just like all Louis V fragrances it lasts for most of the day. I would say this is a safe blind buy for anyone who loves Chanel platinum egoiste, Aqua di gio, or Aventus. It is not exactly like any of those but in the same clean and bright family imo. Everyone complains about the price of Louis Vuitton fragrances but I think they are worth every penny. They LAST. If you are thinking about getting samples of meteore you should also get l,immenste, imagination and orage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1904339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1904339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Overapplying can be suffocating - 2 or 3 sprays and I am done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1874443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1874443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295740">RayCashhhh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This an enjoyable wear. Meteoré is very fresh and sort of aquatic, but it's definitely a statement maker. I think it's very suitable for nighttime wear, especially in the summer. Very vetiver forward, but there's a ton of spice here too. Overpriced for what it is, but as a decant I have no complaints. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1869079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1869079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1868898" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ryan_cool"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1025845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ryan_cool" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-Extreme-Parfum-75489.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75489.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir Extreme Parfum"title="Noir Extreme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1868898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1868898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025845">ryan_cool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 13:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up fresh and metallique like azzaro chrome but it ends in the dry down like eternity CK.<br />
It has a decent performance for a freshie<br />
8/10 overall</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1868898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1868898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866886" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hurt_Stummy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781047"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781047.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hurt_Stummy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1866886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1866886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1859377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1859377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="millerje86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="millerje86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1859377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1859377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877">millerje86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-18">06/18/23 16:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells nice…but very familiar, I can’t put my finger on “what” - but I’ll get there. <br />
<br />
Initial impressions after a first wearing, I like it. It’s nice. Of course it’s not “groundbreaking”, but not everything has to be. That being said, I doubt I go for a full bottle purchase. It would get worn no doubt - but there’s just so much more on my list to buy before I would hand out the kind of money these LV’s go for. However, if money is no issue and you’re looking for a fresh, clean, bright, easy to wear and easy to like fragrance with some brand recognition behind it, you could do worse than this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547377">natrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-11">06/11/23 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am about to ruin everyone's day on this one...for those of you that remember "Classic Match" cologne. It's a designer imposter of name brand designers. Eternity for Men by Classic Match, was a horrible interpretation of the Calvin Klein staple. It smelled ok at the time, and served more as a car freshener than a regular rotation. Fast forward 30 years later and LV slapped a label on it, market it up 300%. This is EXACTLY the same thing. 3.93 is pretty generous for this boring mess</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1854216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1854216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853448" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nah996"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.983248.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nah996" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Météore"title="Météore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); It smells just like clean soap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1853448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1853448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849171" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Polar7707"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764534.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Polar7707" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764534">Polar7707</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-04">06/04/23 19:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is actually my favorite mens fragrance from LV, and its not really close for me.  Out of all the men's LV fragrances I own here is my ranking.  There is a pretty far gap between 1-2 for me.  <br />
1. Meteore.  <br />
2. Imagination <br />
3. L'immensite <br />
4. Orage <br />
5. Nouveau Monde<br />
I do not understand why this is considered to be generic to a lot of people. I have NEVER smelled anything similar to this before and I've been into fragrances for a long time.  L'Immensite in my opinion is the closest to generic designer but at the same time, we all have different noses.  I get a very nice aromatic nutmeg and mandarin when I smell this and I simply adore it.  This is not a very citrusy fragrance to me, I actually smell more nutmeg and pepper than  Mandarin or Bergamot.  But the citrus is still very much there and noticeable to me making sparkle just a bit.   One thing I will say is that this does not have longevity, projection or sillage compared to Imagination and L'Immensite, but it is still decent. (4-6 hours)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1849171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1849171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
