There are certainly better freshies from LV</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1842921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1842921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842438" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="binker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138305"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="binker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842438ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842438" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138305">binker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-26">05/26/23 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells sooo nice fresh clean. Going to be my new signature scent for spring &amp; summer. Probably the nicest fresh fragrance I have in my collection. I don’t get any blue vibes but maybe a little azzaro chrome. It’s almost like a fresh version of MFK Amyris homme</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1842438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1842438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827333" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-07">05/07/23 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sorry LV fans, Meteore proved to be another unoriginal archetypal 2010s fresh male fragrance. There is nothing that sets this apart from the competition. And the price point is simply ridiculous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1827333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1827333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1823961" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Patj1994"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Patj1994" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-53-Man-64153.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64153.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude 53 Man"title="Interlude 53 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1823961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1823961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641793">Patj1994</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-03">05/03/23 10:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is fantastic, but nothing groundbreaking. Smells so fresh and clean….it’s amazing. Be wary though, projection is very, very strong and can fill a room with only a few sprays. Stick to 1 or 2 for best results. Becomes very suffocating and unpleasant when over-sprayed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1823961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1823961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1810152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1810152" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yalcin05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yalcin05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-Parfum-89988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood Parfum"title="Oud Wood Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1810152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1810152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251">Yalcin05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-16">04/16/23 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent, very versatile and yet complex. Yes it can smell like a designer, and it is a designer, and yes it comes with a price which is not overpriced in my opinion. It’s really blended perfectly, smoothed out and smells somehow luxury. It’s a cross between l immensite and imagination and a little bittle platinum egoist. If you have those 2 LV I’ve mentioned this is pretty redundant, same vibe different angle. <br />
<br />
Clean metallic Musc, with that green fresh citrus signature of LV perfumes. Great perfume and if you ask me between these 3.. choose this one. l immensite is amazing but for me has a strange banana smell kind of thing. imagination is incomplete but this one has a nice journey and an amazing drydown. <br />
<br />
Performance is good for a freshie 8-12 hours.. projection if you are in a airco setting is amazing, otherwise could be pretty close,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1810152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1810152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801493" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801493ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801493" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-05">04/05/23 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can't say I'm surprised that I love this one. I think it's a sexy, magnetic blend of citrus and spices with a celestial quality about it that makes it perfect for any summer night date, from fancy dinner to stargazing at the beach. Hence the name fits quite perfectly, in all honesty. <br />
<br />
The scent profile is smooth, somewhat metallic and powerful, but in an elegant and sophisticated way. It starts off citrusy with, again, this celestial vibe: I swear it smells like they could've crushed up a constellation of stars and put it in this bottle. The drydown emphasizes this, with hints of spicy aromatics and a subtle woodiness. Of course, the transition from the opening to the drydown is quite gradual and stealthy, so you might not notice the development of the accords until a significant amount of time has passed.<br />
<br />
I realize some people will bash this fragrance because it smells "generic", but even if there's a sense of familiarity, the superior quality and distinctly celestial vibe definitely set Météore apart from its competitors. In this regard, I'll have to agree with @Squishyy's comment (about 5-10 comments below mine).<br />
<br />
One aspect I absolutely cannot complain about in regards to this fragrance is performance. It projects well and lasts at least 12 hours on my skin. Given that it's my ideal fragrance on summer nights, I could wear it in the evening, sleep, wake up 8 hours later, take a shower, and still catch whiffs of it. So yeah, pretty beastly.<br />
<br />
In the end, when I was looking for a fragrance that performed well both in the scorching day heat and on a warm summer night, I found Météore and I seriously couldn't say I regret it at all. I'm quite pleasantly surprised with the quality of fragrances I've tried from Louis Vuitton, so massive props to their perfumer. Honestly, for me, this might just top L'Immensité.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1801493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1801493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799353" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RonSmith"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RonSmith" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231273">RonSmith</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing fragrance with great longevity. Almost identical to Azzaro Chrome.<br />
Chrome came out 24 years before Meteore for less than 10% the price Meteore cost, so it's not worth buying in my opinion. <br />
<br />
I can almost say it's a copy of Chrome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1799353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1799353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1793374" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1793374" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="K8O"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1714554"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="K8O" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1793374ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1793374" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1714554">K8O</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-26">03/26/23 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells nice, clean and fresh on my skin.  Walking around outside I would get wafts of it if I moved my arms around, but when I stepped inside it was quite potent and I actually looked around for who was wearing the loud scent.  Spoiler, it was me. I enjoyed it, but I can get something similar for a lot less.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1793374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1793374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wowoweee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1700301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wowoweee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700301">wowoweee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 15:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>elevated axe body spray. mass-appealing and definitely smells “good”, but every time I wear it I feel like a teenage boy. also like axe, the opening is loud and throughout the wear I wonder if I’m being intrusive.<br />
<br />
it’s a well-made fragrance, but for a basic men’s shower gel/club scent it’s wildly overpriced<br />
<br />
update: I think I was too harsh. it smells fresh and masculine and performance is phenomenal</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1790970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1790970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1787786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afrikano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afrikano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1787786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1787786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419">Afrikano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-19">03/19/23 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very nice light/fresh fragrance but the longevity is extremely poor. Not only that the sillage isn’t that great either and for $300 I can’t ever justify spending this much on a bottle. I get fresh fragrances aren’t the best performing but the smell of Meteore isn’t even unique enough for me to think about buying this. My favorite out of this line is still Afternoon Swim, but after owning Turathi Blue I can’t justify picking that up either because it’s too similar and Turathi blue has an extremely better sillage and better longevity for a 1/6th of the price. I was hoping for something fresh but still unique like the Blu Mediterranean Line from Acqua Di Parma, which doesn’t have the best longevity at all but has still some of the most unique and addicting fresh fragrances I’ve ever smelled before. Sample Meteore on skin first (and multiple times) like I did before you think about buying. If you enjoy it more power to you, but for the price and what you get this is a very hard pass for me. 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1787786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1787786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1780518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1780518" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RhettB27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RhettB27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/Artisan-Pure-46623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artisan Pure"title="Artisan Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1780518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1780518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688">RhettB27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-10">03/10/23 23:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are a lover of soapy-clean fragrances this is a very solid one that I’ve come to really enjoy. It offers a nice fresh spiciness that pops with the citrus and adds elegance working with and into an earthy/dirty dimension as it dries that lends it a hint of ruggedness, very effectively coming across in a classic but also contemporary manner. I also really appreciate the way its greenness and brightness is executed and contrasted with the Java Vetiver which helps give it a lot of character. It’s understandable why this one is a polarizing offering from LV but I found it to be a gem especially after a few wearings. It is quite different than fragrances like Tom Ford Beau de Jour and Chanel Egoïste Platinum, but Météore possesses very timeless clean masculine qualities as such that I personally find to fit me better. If you want a classic “barbershop” profile or enjoy them, but feel they don’t quite suit you, give this a shot as it does have elements of them pulled off in a different way that isn’t as sharp, herbal, or floral.<br />
<br />
Also makes me happy that others have already added Dior Homme Sport 2021 to the “reminds” section. Definitely a distinct familiarity with Météore and really Météore imo contains elements of all 3 Dior Sport releases from 2012-2021 in some way. Probably a reason I really like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1780518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1780518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766205" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766205" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Research"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1180997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1180997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Research" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/TERRES-DOREES/Mysore-83997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mysore"title="Mysore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766205ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766205" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1180997">Research</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 03:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this all day yesterday (mostly outside) in warm weather. It's pleasant and fairly long-lasting. It will not offend. There are great similarities to Azzaro Chrome but this is smoother and more complex. I will NOT be purchasing a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1766205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1766205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1760128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1760128" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1760128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1760128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-14">02/14/23 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clean, soapy, slightly citrus, slightly spicy scent. Mainly getting pink pepper, vetiver and soap<br />
<br />
It’s a very nice all-around fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1760128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1760128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1752139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304626">Coomerman69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-04">02/04/23 19:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nice but smells exactly like orto Parisi bergamask<br />
I'm not huge fan of high citrus . Freshies. Just never last</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1752139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1752139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1746976" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ihaggins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308549.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ihaggins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/More-Than-Words-16450.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16450.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="More Than Words"title="More Than Words"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1746976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1746976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308549">Ihaggins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-29">01/29/23 19:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is beautiful and masterfully blended. It’s clean, fresh, and soapy. Masculine elegance at its best. People who say this is basic and comparable to designer blue fragrances are reaching big time. This is luxury perfumery. People say it’s over priced. I disagree. I can tell the difference between the quality of  this and other blue fragrances. Similar to how people compare Cool Water and Green Irish Tweed. The smell and overall experience is different... I plan to purchase a full bottle and rotate between this and Imagination as my two primary freshies of choice. Super versatile, super fresh, and easy to wear.<br />
<br />
**Update** 3/15/23<br />
<br />
This gets better and better and better. The more you wear it the more you understand how underrated it is. The only thing that comes even close is Imagination. Which was my summertime signature scent last year. This year I’ll probably wear Meteor more. Be careful with this one though. It pulls a ton of positive attention but it’s also easy to go nose blind to it, and therefore, overspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1746976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1746976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1736869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1736869" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tripp353"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tripp353" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Chrome-Azure-92239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chrome Azure"title="Chrome Azure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1736869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1736869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160895">tripp353</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-18">01/18/23 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Icy, masculine fresh scent with a bit of musk. Very non-descript to be honest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1736869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1736869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1727224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1727224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Radius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Radius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1727224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1727224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460748">Radius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-06">01/06/23 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have on both CK1 and Meteore and sorry LV stans, this is a niche CK1, very close cousin.  If that's your thing, great!  Meteore being a little more sweet and CK1 having a bit more green/pine accord.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1727224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1727224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Squishyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1403891.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Squishyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/BondNo9-com-18133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="BondNo9.com"title="BondNo9.com"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891">Squishyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, fresh, ethereal. Same structure as LV Imagination, but with different notes. Orange at the forefront, and vetiver supporting it through the base. Your white florals are added to give it some elegance, and it’s lightly spiced to add mystique and keep it from going in a powdery direction. Smells like the cleanest guy in the room. It’s not a beast, but performance was good across the table for me. I love it, and will be picking up a bottle soon.<br />
<br />
—Aside<br />
Météore gets downvotes…why? Stop confusing smelling good with smelling basic. You’re nuts if you think this is in the same league as a ‘Sauvage’ down to it being mass-appealingly wearable in the same way. It’s not hard to pick apart the superior execution and quality in all the LV fragrances. Sorry, but when I spend $300 it’s not to smell like the underneath of a couch cushion. Not everything needs to be a work of artistic expression. Price be damned, if this were accurately rated, it would clear 4.30 any day. The snobs came out to play.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1709609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1709609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1708983" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vitodito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303546"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303546.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vitodito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1708983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1708983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); <br />
It’s fresh, clean, easy and floats beautifully in the air. <br />
<br />
It has a nice luxurious undertone. I prefer others from the collection but this is nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1708983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1708983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cirtusy, strong scent, there is a masculine line in it whick makes it strongly men scent.<br />
<br />
I just needed to update my opinion:<br />
<br />
This last forever, I applied 3 o’clock in the afternoon and now on the next morning. I still feel it on me so you can obviously not saying that this is not a strong scant.<br />
It performs exactly as a good quality  EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1677930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1677930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fuc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1513851"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fuc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1513851">fuc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-15">10/15/22 11:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If people think this is boring and generic, then you know they're probably some snob. This is fantastic. You won't smell unique, but you won't smell the same as everyone else, meaning, the smell is simple but the quality is extraordinary and most can pick up on it. This is mass appealing, and executes the job of what a cologne should be perfectly. It's fresh, clean, minty, and very expensive smelling but somehow casual as well. Cheap shower gel my ass cheeks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1666745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1666745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1664135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507">Arsenal Till I Die</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-11">10/11/22 22:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great quality, smells fresh, clean, little soapy, little powdery with almost metallic vibe but in saying that it’s basically a niche version of Azzaro Chrome! I don’t get any sauvage, invictus or barely CK1 comparisons, just  chrome so it’s an easy pass! imagination was at least a little more unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1664135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1664135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1643939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1643939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1643939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-13">09/13/22 02:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This a sort of a good perfume…<br />
<br />
It’s sort of minty, it’s sort of creamy, it’s sort of peppery… it sort of lasts, and it sort of projects… therefore, it’s sort of good…<br />
<br />
Don’t get me wrong, it has a delicious opening, it’s fresh, it’s citrusy, and it’s mass appealing… it’s like a lovechild between Imagination and Mefisto Gentiluomo… but instead of marrying those two worlds and crafting an absolute delight… Jacques Cavallier took a safer road and just created a nice perfume… that’s it, just nice…<br />
<br />
Maybe if performance was any better it would have grown on me more, but by the second hour it was completely intimate, and by the fourth it was completely gone… in fact, by the time I started writing this review I had almost forgot the scent… I had to reapply in order to remember how it smelled.<br />
<br />
And the saddest part is that it has a very likable opening, a really nice creamy citrus opening… but that’s it… after the opening is gone it just spirals into oblivion… and that’s the one thing you don’t want in any perfume, to be forgettable.<br />
<br />
Good for warm weather, although it needs constant reapplying.<br />
<br />
Nothing else to say…</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1643939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1643939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634939" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ahmed193"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1562448.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ahmed193" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562448">Ahmed193</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-31">08/31/22 04:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>not the best but i love it, good for summer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1634939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1634939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1630607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1630607" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gummypepsi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1168227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1168227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gummypepsi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Ombre-Dans-L-Eau-Eau-de-Parfum-49099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Ombre Dans L’Eau Eau de Parfum"title="L’Ombre Dans L’Eau Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1630607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1630607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1168227">gummypepsi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-24">08/24/22 15:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got myself a bottle today and I gotta say it smells absolutely fantastic. The quality in this is simply amazing. Extremely versatile and mass appealing. Major downside is its price and uniqueness, which is a letdown for some (me included) but I still adore it. It gives of a refreshing minty vibe with some aromatic sweetness which I love. Lasts decently long on skin but sillage and performance could be better. Drydown is a bit generic and boring though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1630607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1630607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1583760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1583760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1582486" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1582486" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KwMoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224387"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224387.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KwMoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1582486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1582486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224387">KwMoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-11">06/11/22 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When you smell this perfume you will feel you are familiar with this smell. Many perfumers combine citrusy notes with pepper notes to give you that mint smell. Most of other perfumes losses this fresh, cool and marine notes on the drydown but Meteore keeps giving you these notes until the last second of the 12hrs longevity. Many fails to do this but there is one other perfume that can give the same thing you want from Meteore. I forgot it, its there in my mind but wait ! Yes I got it!! I remember once in the airport I was going to visit Jordan for a short holiday in the dead sea where it’s deadly hot there even in winter! I thought I should buy a very cheap summery perfume from the duty free in Kuwait airport. I didn’t want to buy something expensive because its winter and I am going there for 3 days only. usually I don’t take perfume from my collection with me while traveling. I love to buy new one “and take a bunch of testers”from the duty free and discover them while enjoy experimenting them in my holiday. I bought that 40$ Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum 2016 batch and trust me its very close to Meteore. I might be wrong because its been about 6 years since I wore that perfume. The performance of Kenzo is stunning and the projection is a great. They are very close but Meteore is well blended smother and smells more luxurious than Kenzo!!. Thank you for reading</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1582486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1582486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1575840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But literally smells like the dryer sheet used on laundry with an added citrus scent to it. All the fresh fragrances smell clean to simply put things.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1575840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1575840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1573415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1573415" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dutchhero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343727"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343727.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dutchhero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Coriander-8798.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8798.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coriander"title="Coriander"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1573415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1573415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343727">dutchhero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-29">05/29/22 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is amazing! Very pleasing and very clean. This fragrance is super long lasting and has a great sillage, which is well done for a citrusy fragrance. To give you an example: I accidentally sprayed some on my jacket and two weeks later I can still smell it every time I wear it. The more I smell it, the more I like this fragrance.<br />
<br />
I wouldn't really compare it to an other fragrance as it is a unique scent, and no other scent will give you the same feeling or quality. A find most comparisons a bit like comparing pistachio nuts to hazelnuts: yes they are both nutty, but they are not the same. <br />
<br />
To me, this scent creates a luxurious aura around you, very urban, very manly, yet very clean and pleasing.<br />
This scent is going on my wishlist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1573415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1573415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562503" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lmuradian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.879102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lmuradian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);
