But in regards to scent, compliment factor &amp; performance it’s very very good. Think of CK One meets Cartier Declaration with a modern twist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1562503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1562503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561036" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrizla_b"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1123502.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrizla_b" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123502">chrizla_b</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-10">05/10/22 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isn't going to win many awards for originality but it is what it is and it smells so good. It garners many compliments too, if that's your bag.<br />
<br />
This smells nothing like CK1 at all btw. To me it's 1/5th Platinum Egoiste, 3/5ths Percival, and 1/5th Chrome with all those jagged, spiky metallic edges smoothed over.<br />
<br />
Performance is average but it smells so damn good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1561036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1561036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557893" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F4hrenheit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339476"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F4hrenheit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339476">F4hrenheit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-05">05/05/22 16:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like cheap shower gel to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1557893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1557893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1556902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vitriol08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vitriol08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/The-Library-Collection-Silver-Oud-69051.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69051.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Library Collection Silver Oud"title="The Library Collection Silver Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1556902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1556902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215256">Vitriol08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous, easy to wear, unique, high quality and yes, beastly and lasts forever.<br />
I don t wear frags for compliments but this one does get me a lot of comments, especially from my wife, who loves it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1556902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1556902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1545730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1545730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amal94"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/55752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amal94" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1545730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1545730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/55752">amal94</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-18">04/18/22 04:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this smells very unique, people are comparing it to other fragrances but honestly I don't see the comparisons. It is an absolute compliments beast and genuinely fills the whole office when I'm wearing it. The fragrance has a tonic, citrus like smell with hints of green.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1545730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1545730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1539338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1539338" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="photonparable"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321913.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="photonparable" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1539338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1539338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321913">photonparable</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-08">04/08/22 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada L'Homme &amp; By Kilian Vodka on the Rocks mixed together. <br />
<br />
I will say that this stuff POPs off skin &amp; it has some complex facets you can't pick up from the air. Give it more than a wearing in-store. I was unimpressed after spraying on skin from a tester, but fell in love over several samples. <br />
<br />
Nobody will hate this one, but I can understand if some don't find it memorable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1539338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1539338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1496384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1496384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IAmStaka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1197156.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="IAmStaka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Superz/Tenerife-80305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tenerife"title="Tenerife"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1496384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1496384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197156">IAmStaka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-02">02/02/22 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like an ultra generic shower gel, among the likes of  Azzaro Chrome and CK One, but for 10x the price.<br />
Without a doubt the biggest disappointment I've smelled from LV.<br />
The name is incredible though, I only wanted to sample it because of the cool name. What a letdown =/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1496384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1496384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1495409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heifrank"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1093944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1093944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heifrank" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fort-Manle/Mr-Bojnokopff-s-Purple-Hat-44849.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44849.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mr. Bojnokopff's Purple Hat"title="Mr. Bojnokopff's Purple Hat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1495409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1495409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1093944">Heifrank</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-01">02/01/22 05:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When first smelling this, it was something very familiar. Then I checked Fragrantica. Yes, Azzaro Chrome! It is very similar. Maybe a bit higher quality and more smoothness, a bit darker. However, it surprises me that LV creates fragrances that are so close to cheap mainstream designers. Aren’t they suppose to distinguish themselves from the mass market and represent creativity?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1495409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1495409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="picknenders"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.846250.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="picknenders" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Puredistance/M-V2Q-74481.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74481.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="M V2Q"title="M V2Q"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250">picknenders</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-20">01/20/22 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just love it. i understand the disappointment in terms of not being unique - i suppose there's only so many ways you can achieve a bright/citrus scent. But out of all of my fragrances - there have been two that have actually brightened my spirits due to their uplifting aura: Etat Libre D'orange Cologe - and this. And while $265 is a kick in the cock for a fragrance, the uplifting nature makes me a masochist. Im a big old middle aged country boy who drives a big truck - yet here i am gushing over louis vuitton's summer dandy. The world is going crazy.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1487261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1487261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1486794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1486794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perris-Monte-Carlo/Oud-Imperial-Extrait-37829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Imperial Extrait"title="Oud Imperial Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1486794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1486794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-19">01/19/22 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a PERFECT EXAMPLE of a fragrance designed to get you to buy it based on the top notes. <br />
<br />
The opening and heart notes are fantastic and feel high quality designer. But... Once you get to the drydown you will want your money back. The base is a wimpy vetiver along with a slight musk and pez candy. <br />
<br />
And the drydown also smells synthetic and generic. It smells like a mid tier designer after the opening.<br />
<br />
Scent 5/10<br />
Performance 5.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1486794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1486794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1470117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1470117" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Esna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.130358.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Esna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parle-Moi-de-Parfum/Comete-Paradis-62-88761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comète Paradis / 62"title="Comète Paradis / 62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1470117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1470117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358">Esna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-25">12/25/21 11:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 part Windex and 3 parts Ck One; chilled in a multifaceted crystal decanter and served on the rocks... but actual real rocks, not ice. Aquatic, sparkling, crisp and unisex although it leans slightly masculine. <br />
<br />
I love the name and in retrospect, it’s really nice nice nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1470117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1470117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1463235" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1463235" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lfod1992"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lfod1992" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1463235ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1463235" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171503">Lfod1992</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-14">12/14/21 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This grows on you. It almost reminds me of a more grown up, higher quality Invictus. This stuff lasts forever on me and projects for a long time, I’m constantly getting whiffs of this like 10-12 hours later. Another solid release from Louis Vuitton.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1463235"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1463235#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Easy to wear but nothing special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1442590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1442590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1404933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; BTW - this can be a massive compliment getter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1392083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1392083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1389280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1389280" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="neonaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.779895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="neonaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Woman-by-Ralph-Lauren-45741.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45741.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woman by Ralph Lauren"title="Woman by Ralph Lauren"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1389280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1389280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/779895">neonaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-09">08/09/21 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing special. Just man's cologne. Cucumber fresh and sport-kind-citrusy in the beginning and softens in an hour. I can detect vetiver and powdery notes. Good but soooo ordinary. Doesn't worth its money</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1389280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1389280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1371739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jerard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965754"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.965754.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jerard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit"title="Fahrenheit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1371739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1371739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965754">Jerard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-06">07/06/21 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After seeing it in a girl's list of her lady killer frags on youtube alongside aventus and sausage, ordered a sample vial, smelt it and fell flat. Like sweet bubble gum nothingness trying to be sauvage, although lacking the depth and three dimensionality of sauvage. Needlessly – not a love at first whiff. <br />
<br />
WELL. Ignored the little thing for the next few days but after coveting the image of the bottle for so long, I decided to give it chances and dabbed it on often. SUDDENLY, on mother's day it hit me across the face. This tasty gorgeous bubble gummy citrus opening which unfortunately doesn't evolve much as it dries down but what can I say – I'm hooked. <br />
<br />
This does take inspiration from sauvage and rise of citrus-ambroxan shower gelly frags but it does its own thing with the mandarin and for me it's fine to inhabit familiar territory so long as it provides a new perspective, which this does. My only complaint is that this claims to have cardamom and nutmeg and vetiver which in theory give a fragrance texture but in here you wouldn't know they're there unless you looked it up. I resent the linearity in this but love it enough to be considering purchasing a bottle. <br />
<br />
Also, sorry to disappoint, I do not see this fragrance for people who are not young, virile males in their early to late 20s. Just like sauvage, this brings to mind a youthful suave womanizer aesthetic. Gold chain, Burberry shirt, Mercedes car, fresh haircut; You get the picture. Total clubbing scent for any day in the spring, summer. Made for shinning on the weekend that the name couldn't be more fitting.<br />
Is it better than sauvage? I do not think this is better than sauvage edp (which is my favorite concentration) when considering the price. But I like that this is so new and unknown by the masses that it's a hidden gem in that sense and is my only justification for buying this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1371739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1371739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354408" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Djedi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/373232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.373232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Djedi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/373232">Djedi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Your run of the mill citrus-soapy scent. The neroli is there, mandarin, bergamot, pepper. Definitely not worth the price tag. It doesn't smell bad by any means and could be a good dumb reach during summer, but after some time it reminds me of some type of shower gel. It appears the base is fairly amberwood heavy. Not feminine at all. Average performance. All in all nothing special.<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1354408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1354408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1343873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1343873" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lmuradian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.879102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lmuradian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1343873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1343873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879102">Lmuradian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-15">05/15/21 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great scent. It continuously gets complimented out of a lot of the scents that i own. One comment i got said you smell like a god.i was scratching my head. Like this smells like a designer scent not something thats worth over two hundred dollars. But its a very good fresh scent not the best but if you're looking for compliments this will do it.<br />
<br />
Scent: 7.8/10<br />
Sillage :8.5/10<br />
Compliments :8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1343873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1343873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1322133" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dannyblaze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313315"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313315.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dannyblaze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-Exclusif-46633.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46633.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton Exclusif"title="Layton Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1322133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1322133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313315">Dannyblaze</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-09">04/09/21 01:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Refined cool water, great projection, nothing special, overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1322133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1322133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1295169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1295169" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1295169ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1295169" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-19">02/19/21 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Météore opens like smooth orange candy, made from natural orange. The pink pepper adds a fuzzy, floral note (like a rose without the edges), which soon becomes more prominent as the orange begins to fade. The spicy accords are very soft for me, like a low, warm purr beneath the sweetness—though they build to a kind of sharp, papery note after a couple of hours, as the other notes fade. <br />
<br />
The vetiver is not strong on me, but it does give Météore a bit of a shadowy, soft, earthiness.<br />
<br />
I find this extremely unisex, leaning only very slightly masculine, like a posh young man in a tailored cream suit, out walking in the gardens of the family estate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1295169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1295169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1289009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
