It is just another blue fragrance big no for me especially for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1289009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1289009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1226031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1226031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="prada_man23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="prada_man23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1226031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1226031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172637">prada_man23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-18">09/18/20 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got a sample, sprayed on paper and not sure I even want to put it on skin. I own sauvage, not a fan of it but I have worn it enough times to know it well. This meteore is sauvage. Non-descript deoderant. There is almost a nice neroli note that is trying to get some attention but it's being bullied by the ambroxan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1226031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1226031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222787" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="robin1234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="robin1234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bortnikoff/Musk-Khabib-54484.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54484.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musk Khabib"title="Musk Khabib"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254357">robin1234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-10">09/10/20 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has a very pleasant scent. Opens up like JV Artisan pure with bright citrus note, then turns a little creamy and floral (resembles a toned down PDM Percival) and ends with woody &amp; musky base note. The dry-down stayed with me for at least 6-7 hours and people near me could still detect it and i got quite a few compliments. To me, without any doubt, Meteore is made with very high quality ingredients, especially the vetiver at the base note. The longevity is very impressive for a fresh perfume but the price is way too high in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1222787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1222787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1221662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1221662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BirkinSmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BirkinSmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1221662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1221662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253838">BirkinSmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-08">09/08/20 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The people who say this smells like Sauvage and Bleu de Chanel likely only smelled those fragrances one time in a store and immediately discounted them due to them being too "mass appealing." Anyways... Meteore is indeed mass appealing but does not smell like Sauvage or Bleu. It smells like Parfums de Marley Pervical with added dimension from the almost minty spices being used. The top notes of this fragrance are hard to beat, even when compared to legends such as BdC EDP and Roja Elysium. After the top notes fade, that is when i start to smell Parfums de Marley Percival. But as i alluded to, this is more niche and unique than Percival is. Maybe this was made just to sell as an add-on to bag purchases, but it's still a masterpiece. And on top of that, it lasts forever. Remember this was made by Dior's parent company, so its quality is a step above. If you like Percival and Vodka on the Rocks but want something that is in my opinion way better, you need to try this asap. It's best for the spring and summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1221662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1221662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1218876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1218876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonardo3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1051401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonardo3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Loewe-7-Plata-55265.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55265.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Loewe 7 Plata"title="Loewe 7 Plata"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1218876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1218876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051401">Leonardo3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-01">09/01/20 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've sampled all of Louis Vuitton's men's fragrances, all of the unisex collection (California Dream, Afternoon Swim, etc.) and some of the women's collection. My favorites are Sur La Route and Orage. Finally, after a few weeks of earger anticipation, I got to try Météore. I'm not sure what all the eagerness was about; maybe I worked up my hopes after reading the press releases and prerelease commentary on the Internet. I was thinking that this might be the one I finally break down and buy. Being partial to fresh, woody, transparent fragrances, what could go wrong with a perfume that includes mandarin, neroli, bergamot, black pepper, Sichuan pepper, pink pepper, and vetiver?<br />
<br />
Amber. That's what went wrong. <br />
<br />
After the delightfully zingy, ethereal top notes burned off (15-30 minutes), a banal woody-amber aromachemical began to emerge and ruined it for me. It's not the kind of amber that smells "yellow" or "orange". I don't know what the chemical is specifically, but it's commonly found in modern youth-oriented men's designer fragrances. To perfumer Jacques Cavallier's credit, he used the woody amber with deft restraint; it could have been much worse. Just going on memory, I think the woody-amber note is similar to, if not the same as, something in the base of YSL Y edt and edp. <br />
<br />
To be sure, Météore is made from top notch ingredients. The clean, fractional distillations behind the bright and beautiful citrusy opening are without fault—none of that cheapness I can't help but associate with low cost citrus fragrances. In the end, though, I just can't handle that woody-amber men's fragrance cliché that the rest of the scent is built upon. <br />
<br />
Météore is by no means a disaster. If the list of notes and scent description seem the least bit appealing, you should at least give it a shot. For a fresh masculine LV, I'll stick to Sur La Route.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1218876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1218876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1709609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Squishyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1403891.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Squishyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/BondNo9-com-18133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="BondNo9.com"title="BondNo9.com"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891">Squishyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, fresh, ethereal. Same structure as LV Imagination, but with different notes. Orange at the forefront, and vetiver supporting it through the base. Your white florals are added to give it some elegance, and it’s lightly spiced to add mystique and keep it from going in a powdery direction. Smells like the cleanest guy in the room. It’s not a beast, but performance was good across the table for me. I love it, and will be picking up a bottle soon.<br />
<br />
—Aside<br />
Météore gets downvotes…why? Stop confusing smelling good with smelling basic. You’re nuts if you think this is in the same league as a ‘Sauvage’ down to it being mass-appealingly wearable in the same way. It’s not hard to pick apart the superior execution and quality in all the LV fragrances. Sorry, but when I spend $300 it’s not to smell like the underneath of a couch cushion. Not everything needs to be a work of artistic expression. Price be damned, if this were accurately rated, it would clear 4.30 any day. The snobs came out to play.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1709609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1709609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="picknenders"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.846250.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="picknenders" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Puredistance/M-V2Q-74481.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74481.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="M V2Q"title="M V2Q"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/846250">picknenders</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-20">01/20/22 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just love it. i understand the disappointment in terms of not being unique - i suppose there's only so many ways you can achieve a bright/citrus scent. But out of all of my fragrances - there have been two that have actually brightened my spirits due to their uplifting aura: Etat Libre D'orange Cologe - and this. And while $265 is a kick in the cock for a fragrance, the uplifting nature makes me a masochist. Im a big old middle aged country boy who drives a big truck - yet here i am gushing over louis vuitton's summer dandy. The world is going crazy.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1487261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1487261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1643939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1643939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1643939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-13">09/13/22 02:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This a sort of a good perfume…<br />
<br />
It’s sort of minty, it’s sort of creamy, it’s sort of peppery… it sort of lasts, and it sort of projects… therefore, it’s sort of good…<br />
<br />
Don’t get me wrong, it has a delicious opening, it’s fresh, it’s citrusy, and it’s mass appealing… it’s like a lovechild between Imagination and Mefisto Gentiluomo… but instead of marrying those two worlds and crafting an absolute delight… Jacques Cavallier took a safer road and just created a nice perfume… that’s it, just nice…<br />
<br />
Maybe if performance was any better it would have grown on me more, but by the second hour it was completely intimate, and by the fourth it was completely gone… in fact, by the time I started writing this review I had almost forgot the scent… I had to reapply in order to remember how it smelled.<br />
<br />
And the saddest part is that it has a very likable opening, a really nice creamy citrus opening… but that’s it… after the opening is gone it just spirals into oblivion… and that’s the one thing you don’t want in any perfume, to be forgettable.<br />
<br />
Good for warm weather, although it needs constant reapplying.<br />
<br />
Nothing else to say…</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1643939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1643939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038155" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jj000777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jj000777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612">jj000777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 01:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m so glad my bf and I smelled this without looking at notes or reviews. We love perfumes and I’f just gotten ~20 samples for him from split scent to begin exploring.<br />
<br />
This was our #1. (Top 4 below) this is such a crazy f*cking scent. We got literal meteor on him. Cold void of space and clean dry rock. Atmospheric, clean and just like someone else mentioned, a major grower. The fact that this is a citrus boggles my mind. It’s like alchemy. Super cool, bought it for him for vday. <br />
<br />
Top 4:<br />
<br />
1. Meteore<br />
2. Silver Mountain Water<br />
3. Bal D’Afrique<br />
4. Luna Rose Ocean</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2038155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2038155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561036" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrizla_b"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1123502.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrizla_b" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123502">chrizla_b</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-10">05/10/22 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isn't going to win many awards for originality but it is what it is and it smells so good. It garners many compliments too, if that's your bag.<br />
<br />
This smells nothing like CK1 at all btw. To me it's 1/5th Platinum Egoiste, 3/5ths Percival, and 1/5th Chrome with all those jagged, spiky metallic edges smoothed over.<br />
<br />
Performance is average but it smells so damn good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1561036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1561036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="62251" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1218876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1218876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonardo3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1051401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonardo3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Loewe-7-Plata-55265.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55265.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Loewe 7 Plata"title="Loewe 7 Plata"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1218876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1218876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051401">Leonardo3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-01">09/01/20 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've sampled all of Louis Vuitton's men's fragrances, all of the unisex collection (California Dream, Afternoon Swim, etc.) and some of the women's collection. My favorites are Sur La Route and Orage. Finally, after a few weeks of earger anticipation, I got to try Météore. I'm not sure what all the eagerness was about; maybe I worked up my hopes after reading the press releases and prerelease commentary on the Internet. I was thinking that this might be the one I finally break down and buy. Being partial to fresh, woody, transparent fragrances, what could go wrong with a perfume that includes mandarin, neroli, bergamot, black pepper, Sichuan pepper, pink pepper, and vetiver?<br />
<br />
Amber. That's what went wrong. <br />
<br />
After the delightfully zingy, ethereal top notes burned off (15-30 minutes), a banal woody-amber aromachemical began to emerge and ruined it for me. It's not the kind of amber that smells "yellow" or "orange". I don't know what the chemical is specifically, but it's commonly found in modern youth-oriented men's designer fragrances. To perfumer Jacques Cavallier's credit, he used the woody amber with deft restraint; it could have been much worse. Just going on memory, I think the woody-amber note is similar to, if not the same as, something in the base of YSL Y edt and edp. <br />
<br />
To be sure, Météore is made from top notch ingredients. The clean, fractional distillations behind the bright and beautiful citrusy opening are without fault—none of that cheapness I can't help but associate with low cost citrus fragrances. In the end, though, I just can't handle that woody-amber men's fragrance cliché that the rest of the scent is built upon. <br />
<br />
Météore is by no means a disaster. If the list of notes and scent description seem the least bit appealing, you should at least give it a shot. For a fresh masculine LV, I'll stick to Sur La Route.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1218876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1218876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silvs16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silvs16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581493">silvs16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Drys down to a plastic smell that is pretty off putting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2254291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2254291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972766" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violeteme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violeteme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/Sisley-Eau-de-3-5852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sisley Eau de 3"title="Sisley Eau de 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189">violeteme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely generic male type fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="1972766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=1972766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JJ2137"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JJ2137" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714">JJ2137</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-08">03/08/24 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would give it "ok" rating if It cost 30$... Man, the first hit is generic men's shower gel and after 15 minutes what you get is sharp, suffocating, peppery, musky deodorant... for 300$? Give me a break</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62251"comment_id="2086143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html?ccid=2086143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;     </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">

            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">21.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

<script>
    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
